usage: Weather impact metrics on audience behavior, media consumption, and campaign performance

dataMapping.title: Weather Impact Analysis
dataMapping.subtitle: Weather-driven audience behavior and campaign performance analysis

metrics.secondaryLabel: Weather-driven changes in indoor digital media usage and streaming behavior

items.actualLabel: Current weather impact on streaming (e.g., 'Rainy weather increases indoor streaming', 'Sunny weather reduces indoor time')
items.forecastedLabel: Weather forecast streaming projection (e.g., 'Continued rain expected to maintain high streaming', 'Clearing weather will reduce indoor time')
insights: Weather behavior insights (e.g., 'Rainy weather increases indoor media consumption by 45%', 'Cold temperatures drive streaming platform usage up 30%')
risks: Weather-related risks (e.g., 'Sudden weather changes may disrupt viewing patterns', 'Power outages during storms affect streaming')
recommendations: Weather-based optimization recommendations (e.g., 'Increase streaming platform ad spend during rain forecast', 'Target indoor entertainment content during cold snaps')

items.actualLabel: Current weather impact on mobile usage
